programme.desc: When a successful meat company owner is murdered, Briscoe and Logans investigation into the mans death leads them to a Russian mail-order bride.

programme.title: Law and Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Logan investigate when the son of Schiffs friend is kidnapped and isnt returned after the kidnappers ransom demands are met.

programme.title: Law and Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Logan help a young mother who claims her newborn baby was stolen from her after she gave birth in a taxi on the way to the hospital.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When the lead suspect of an unsolved and high-profile robbery case is released from prison, the NCIS team resumes their investigation with an undercover stakeout.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The teams holiday plans are put on hold when the murder investigation of a Navy veteran includes the discovery of a newborn baby who has no identification.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: United States Secretary of Defence Wynn Crawford shuts down Gibbs murder investigation and demands that Special Agents McGee and Torres be arrested.

programme.title: Person of Interest

programme.title: Person of Interest

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a rape victim is brought to the E.R. after a brutal and lengthy assault, Detective Benson recognizes the signature of a rapist on whom she believed the book had been closed eight years ago. The team must reopen the case to rule out whether there was a wrongful conviction back then, or they are dealing with a copycat now.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A rape and kidnapping is reported by the husband who watched it unfold via videochat while traveling home from a business trip. When the ransom demand is met, detectives intercept the wife when she arrives to get the money. Her debriefing, however, raises Bensons suspicions and a full investigation is launched.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: When former Special Agent Quinn is found locked inside a storage unit, the BAU questions his account of hunting down an UnSub dubbed The Strangler.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team boards an aircraft carrier to find out how a sailor with no history of drug abuse overdosed on methamphetamines. When a second sailor overdoses, Gibbs becomes convinced someone is doping sailors without their knowledge.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: The murder of a young man who recently left his familys religious community leads Dylan and Lizzie to a series of possible suspects; Lizzies younger sister unexpectedly drops by for a visit.

programme.title: Concorde: A Supersonic Story
programme.desc: The life of the most glamorous plane ever built, told by the people whose lives she touched. On the eve of the opening of Bristols aerospace museum, a cast of engineers, flight technicians and frequent fliers tell the supersonic story.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Longing for her old life, Gemma tries reliving a past night out, only to realise she has changed forever and misses Sadie. Malcolms babysitting night in is upturned by Derek, who ropes Malcolm into helping him exact revenge on his ex-wife. In an attempt to support his friend, whilst keeping Sadie safe from all perceived threats, Malcolm panics when Gemma announces she is coming home early.

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World

programme.title: Scam City: Money, Mayhem and Maseratis
programme.desc: As Mobeen continues to immerse himself in the world of forex, he comes across a number of young traders who will stop at nothing to achieve financial success. What becomes clear is the thin line between believing in those dreams and the dangers involved in risking everything to achieve them. With Instagram forex traders making it look so easy, Mobeen realises their wealth might have come through other means.

programme.title: Scam City: Money, Mayhem and Maseratis
programme.desc: The search for Gurvin nears its conclusion, as Mobeen exhausts every lead to take him within roads of his home address. As the links between the Bahamas and UK become ever more apparent, a visit to a lawyer specialising in forex fraud helps Mobeen realise how widespread the problem is. With the words of a whistleblower still ringing in his ears, Mobeen prepares to confront the key players he believes can reveal the truth behind the rumours swirling around Gurvin.

programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Tash and Tim hit Perthshire and Tayside, unearthing a mysterious landscape, a pottery crush and a crafty use for a quintessentially Scottish plant.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Banter, bargains and a honking horn. Tash and Tim get in a tangle, chasing curio hits and coffee highs on their penultimate Scottish road trip.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Horticulturists offer various techniques to elevate the home gardening experience, from repositioning roses in rustic layouts to planning vibrant spring displays.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Political Thinking with Nick Robinson
programme.desc: Nick Robinson has a conversation with, not an interrogation of, the people who shape our political thinking about what shaped theirs.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Brainbox Challenge
programme.desc: Clive Anderson hosts a brain training quiz show in which contestants battle to prove themselves in a sequence of brain games which test their memory, language, visual, numerical and spacial skills.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The eight finalists compete to win the dessert course at a banquet celebrating great Britons of the past and the shows twentieth year, with Dame Prue Leith returning to help judge.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the final of Great British Menu. The chefs cook a banquet for modern-day heroes at Blenheim Palace, with dishes celebrating historic Britons. Who will be voted 2025 champion of champions?

programme.title: The Bear Family and Me
programme.desc: As summer arrives Gordon returns to Minnesota and discovers that the tiny bear cub Hope has been abandoned by her mother. He tracks down the starving cub, but her life hangs in the balance and Gordon becomes a surrogate bear mother.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: The show comes from Milestones Museum in Basingstoke, which recreates the streets of Hampshire past. Elizabeth Talbot and James Lewis are the experts doing the honours as they find the best antiques and collectibles to take to auction. Meanwhile, Paul Martin meets a modern sculptor who takes nature as his inspiration, carving everything from scorpions to giant spiders.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Celebrity contestants Nathan Bryon, Ruth Langsford, Spencer Matthews, and Rosie Ramsey take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman. Will the winning stars opt for the coveted House of Games dartboard?

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Fleur serves up more Strictly exclusives and is joined by a trio of celebrity super fans. Plus a sneak peak at the remaining couples first rehearsals on the ballroom floor.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Ben Robinson travels to Johnshaven, a once-important Scottish fishing village. When its skilled sailors were press-ganged into the Royal Navy in the late 18th century, it had to diversify into the flax and jute trade.

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Bob wants to catch a tope - a rare species of shark - and takes Paul to Ceredigion to fish the sea.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Frances Tophill returns to Damson Farm near Bath, getting stuck into a multitude of jobs - mulching veg beds, taming a Japanese wineberry and taking holly cuttings.

programme.title: Lucy Worsley Investigates
programme.desc: Lucy Worsley investigates how the trial of one `witch sparked Britains witch-hunt craze. She begins her investigation in North Berwick, a seaside town not far from Edinburgh, where the witch hunting craze began. The story goes that in 1590, a coven of witches gathered here to cast a spell to try to kill the King of Scotland, James VI.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig takes a QI look at the Wild West with Alex Brooker, Jo Brand, Eshaan Akbar and Alan Davies.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather

programme.desc: A long-smouldering flame is rekindled when a once-popular opera star reunites with her ex-husband and fellow performers at a retirement home for musicians.

programme.title: Turner: The Secret Sketchbooks
programme.desc: Turner painted the world like no-one else, yet his life remains a mystery. Tracey Emin, Timothy Spall and Ronnie Wood explore his personal sketches to reveal the man behind the art.

programme.title: Wild Cherry
programme.sub-title: Call It Mothers Intuition or Whatever
programme.desc: As the police hunt for Iris, the mothers refuse to listen to Lornas concerns about what the girls are up to. Juliet falls out with Lorna and gets closer to an enigmatic Gigi, while Allegra does a secret deal with K Rizz. The app gets more dangerous, with serious consequences as a photo circulates.

programme.title: The Crash Detectives
programme.desc: Two men on a powerful sports bike fight for their lives after crashing into a wall. A seriously injured woman is cut free from the wreckage when a car collides with a stationary lorry.

His story takes him from a modest Trinidadian childhood to breaking theatrical boundaries in the UK, before achieving household fame in the now controversial sitcom Love Thy Neighbour.

programme.title: The Waltons Homecoming
programme.desc: The Walton family is excited to learn that John Sr. will be coming home for Christmas during the winter of 1933. However, when a storm threatens his arrival and hes nowhere to be found, John Boy embarks on a life-changing journey to find him.

programme.title: The Bear Family and Me
programme.desc: Gordon returns to Minnesota in early autumn to discover that the life of abandoned bear cub, Hope, has taken an unexpected turn for the better. Hope is back together with her mother Lily, but the bears are in danger when hunters move into the forest. Gordons role changes from cameraman to bodyguard as he walks with the bears to try to keep them safe.

programme.title: Witness for the Prosecution
programme.desc: A top-flight barrister attempts to defend murder suspect Leonard Vole, who stands accused of murdering a wealthy widow for the fortune she left behind. To make matters worse, his alibi, provided by his wife Christine, falls down when it is revealed their marriage is not fully legal and she can be used as a witness for the prosecution.

programme.title: The Ipcress File
programme.desc: Agent Harry Palmer is assigned to investigate a bizarre brain drain among scientists, and finds himself embroiled in a world of espionage where nobody can be trusted and nothing is what it seems.

programme.title: Timmy Time

He tries some crazy alternatives with no luck, until he hears a strange chiming noise coming from Paxton on the see-saw.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: Ted and his family go on a walk through the woods and everyone joins in a big bug hunt. When they come across a bridge over a stream, they decide to have an epic game of pooh sticks.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Iaia is cooking for us today and he is making a delicious stew from Guinea-Bissau called Kansiye. The dish is made with lentils, although not all of his friends are sure about the taste and smell of them when they try them before the meal. Lets hope Iaias cooked recipe, served with rice and carrots, changes their minds. Before serving, Iaia puts a vase of olive branches on his table, as these are a symbol of Guinea-Bissau.

programme.title: Ferne and Rorys Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Ezra discovers lots of interesting facts about crabs. Rory and his son Sandy take a trip to the seaside to look in rock pools for crabs. Ferne meets a crab with no shell of its own at the aquarium.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?

programme.sub-title: A Toy Tiger Comes to School
programme.desc: Lucas and his classmates are learning to write the letter t for tiger. After watching how its done by Mrs Collins, Lucas helps his friend Otto. The children discover the classroom is in a mess and a spot tiger paw print on the floor. Could it be a toy tiger causing havoc in the school? Lucas has an idea to track down the toy tiger - leaving out pictures and some food - but will it work?

programme.title: Yakka Dee

programme.title: Colourblocks

programme.title: Kiri Pritchard McLean: Home Truths
programme.desc: Kiri Pritchard-McLean is back and a lot has happened. Shes moved back to her home island of Anglesey and gotten some rescue chickens and jokes about skinny jeans, learning Welsh and more.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Chicken Pox
programme.desc: Phoebes submariner boyfriend visits New York on leave from the Navy. Unfortunately, Phoebe catches chicken pox at baby Bens first birthday party. Meanwhile, when Monica realises that Richard has no real neuroses, she worries that she is too strange for him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Barry and Mindys Wedding
programme.desc: When Rachel serves as a bridesmaid at the wedding of her ex-fiance Barry and her friend Mindy, she relives the nightmare of her own failed wedding day. Meanwhile, Chandler becomes enamoured with a woman he meets on the internet, but is surprised when he finally meets her.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joey Fatone joins forces with NBA star/IJ superfan Mo Bamba and teammate Terrance Ross. The three guys have one goal: to assemble the ultimate professional Impractical Jokers team.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys recount some of their favourite celebrity moments from the season. Features unseen footage. David Cross, Eric Andre, Method Man, Jillian Bell, and Brooke Shields appear.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: The mayor decides to take a road trip with Paul after receiving his divorce papers, and leaves Mike in charge of New York City.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike is relieved when his new girlfriend says she doesnt want a commitment, and James has a mysterious new hobby.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Michael tries to dissuade the mayor from having a relationship with a young woman, and Paul acts as Michaels assistant.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: The mayor agrees to a mock election with a disc jockey; the women in the office compete for the water delivery man.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra takes it upon herself to prepare the Thanksgiving dinner but, not wishing to have her turkey compared to Maries, decides to cook fish. Threatened by Debras unorthodox plan, Marie resorts to extreme culinary measures.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray spends all his free time coaching his basketball team, but then realises hes missing out on time with his family.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is upset to discover that the autographed Mickey Mantle baseball his dad gave him years earlier is a fake. So he decides to tell his daughter Ally the truth about Santa.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is forced to hold an important business meeting at the doctors office when Debra and the children fall ill, and Ray also worries about becoming a bad father.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Princess Leia Fantasy
programme.desc: Monica is distraught after her break-up with Richard. Phoebe unsuccessfully tries to raise her spirits, but ultimately its Mr Geller who comforts his daughter. Elsewhere, Chandler and Janice begin seeing each other again and Joey cant stand it. The two plan a day of fun to try to overcome Joeys aversions for Chandlers sake. Meanwhile, Rachel tells Phoebe and Monica about Rosss Princess Leia fantasy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where No Ones Ready
programme.desc: In a race against the clock, Ross tries to get the gang dressed and ready for a black-tie benefit at the museum.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica decides the best way to get over Richard is to keep herself busy. She develops a `jam plan, hoping the distraction of cooking will divert her attention. After making jars and jars of jam Monica decides she still wants to have a baby, so she begins searching for a sperm donor, and comes across Joeys file. Elsewhere, Phoebe is mistakenly stalked by a man who thinks shes Ursula, and Chandler receives dating advice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Metaphorical Tunnel
programme.desc: Ross panics when he sees his son with a Barbie doll, and Chandlers fear of commitment surfaces in his relationship with Janice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes attempts to introduce her visiting half brother Frank Jr to the delights of city life leave him thinking that she works in a brothel. Meanwhile, Ross lists five famous women that he would like to date. To his surprise, actress Isabella Rossellini, one of the women he rejected while narrowing down his list, pops in to Central Perk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When Janice asks whether any of the friends have ever dated one another the gang has a flashback to three years ago (one year before the pilot was supposed to have happened) when everyones lives were beginning to come together. Phoebe moves out of Monicas apartment, Chandler searches for a new roommate - ending up with Joey, Monica bumps into Rachel, and Ross learns that Carol is a lesbian.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Race Car Bed
programme.desc: When Monica buys a new bed from the Mattress King, the wrong one is delivered. Meanwhile, Joey sees Janice kissing her husband, and Rachels father clashes with Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Giant Poking Device
programme.desc: Chandler and Janice reach a turning point in their relationship, while Monica accidentally injures Ben and tries to hide it from Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, the friends form teams and play American football. Ross and Monica relive their sibling rivalry by going head-to-head as opposing team captains. Rachel is upset that Ross didnt choose her for his team, and Joey tries to outwit his foe Chandler. Meanwhile, the turkey is left stewing while the losing team calls for a rematch.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel wonders if shell ever get another job after she quits Central Perk, Joeys new job selling Christmas trees upsets Phoebe, and Ross accidentally breaks a little girls leg.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Cant Remember Which Sister
programme.desc: Ross is suspicious about Rachels possible job offer from a good-looking stranger, while Chandler cant remember which of Joeys many attractive sisters he kissed at a party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Jealousy
programme.desc: Ross becomes increasingly jealous of Rachels sexy new colleague, Mark, and gets the wrong end of the stick when he spies on Rachel at her office. Meanwhile, Monica is enamoured with a sexy busboy who writes love poems for her, and Joey gets himself into trouble by faking his CV in order to get a part in a Broadway musical.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Monica and Richard Are Just Friends
programme.desc: Monica bumps into Richard in a video store and they decide to work on their friendship, but the more time they spend together, the more sexual their relationship becomes. Meanwhile, Phoebe dates an athlete who unintentionally keeps exposing himself by wearing loose shorts, and Rachel agrees to read `The Shining if Joey will read `Little Women.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe is reunited with her former singing partner, Leslie, a failed television commercial jingle writer who wants to use Phoebes signature song `Smelly Cat in an advertisement for cat litter. Meanwhile, Ross becomes jealous when Rachel agrees to go to a fashion lecture with Mark, a former colleague who has just left for a new job, and Chandler meets a beautiful woman, Ginger, who has a prosthetic leg.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel Take a Break
programme.desc: Rachels job prevents her from celebrating her anniversary with Ross. Wanting more time to focus on her new job, she suggests the two take a break from their relationship. Convinced that Rachel has dumped him for one of her workmates, Ross hooks up with a woman from the copy shop that Joey and Chandler have been after.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross tries to prevent Rachel from learning his disturbing secret. Meanwhile, Monica, Phoebe, Chandler and Joey spend a night eavesdropping.

programme.title: Stupid Central
programme.desc: Pranks gone wrong, pet grooming disasters, and how not to get away with cheating!

programme.title: Stupid Central
programme.desc: Cute kids, pensioners growing old disgracefully, and humans taking on the elements!

programme.sub-title: Love Lies and a Buffet Surprise
programme.desc: ...A******? Jimmy Carr, GK Barry and Jamali Maddix put pettiness under the microscope, incl. a woman who lied about her age to a partner and a mums extreme response to her daughters mess.

programme.desc: With Reginald D Hunter, Rachel Riley, Josh Widdicombe and Gemma Collins,.

programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of a group of foul-mouthed elementary school boys in South Park, Colorado. The students, including, Eric Cartman, Stan Marsh, Kyle Broflovski and Kenny McCormick target every conceivable group in outrageous ways.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.desc: Celebrating the life and work of glam rock pioneer Marc Bolan, combined with a behind-the-scenes look at the tribute album of the same name.

programme.title: Suzi Q
programme.desc: Follows the story of the iconic history-making, rock singer-songwriter Suzi Q, who was instrumental in redefining the role of women in rock music, when she broke onto the scene in 1973.

programme.title: Classic Albums
programme.desc: Looking at the creation of classic albums goes behind the Doors eponymous debut album. With the use of interviews, musical demonstration, archive footage and live performances, the documentary tells the story behind the conception and recording of the album, and the three surviving members of the Doors share memories of the bands early days, how the album was put together and of Morrison himself.

programme.title: Landmark
programme.desc: Artists and local communities join forces to compete for the chance to create the UKs next major landmark. Working across various mediums, the artists will work under the watchful eyes of two expert judges and celebrity guests.

programme.title: Art Traffickers: Treasures Stolen From The Tombs
programme.desc: Through a combination of interviews and studio reconstructions, recount the gripping stories behind those who have excavated and stolen masterpieces.

programme.title: Classic FM Live At The Movies
The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob demonstrates the secret behind his wet-on-wet technique while painting waves crashing against rocks.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob shares his love of nature by painting mountains surrounded by evergreens and bushes on smooth foothills.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.sub-title: I Like It Here in Wilmington
programme.desc: When a clothing manufacturer finds himself on the verge of bankruptcy, he ponders the idea of murdering his wife for the insurance money.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Steve and Jane are con artists who gain access to peoples homes claiming to be doing research into polish. But eventually, they meet their match.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A lawyer, with blackmail in mind, meets with a famed prosecutor to prove he convicted an innocent man.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A convicted robber stays with the family of his cellmate after his release from prison, against the better judgement of his parole officer.

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: A look at the life and career of a celebrated Australian filmmaker, known for `The Quiet American, `Rabbit-Proof Fence and `Dead Calm.

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: A look into the life and career of Hollywood superstar Samuel L. Jackson. From `Coming to America and `Pulp Fiction to `Django Unchained, he has starred in many iconic films across the decades.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Seeking a divorce from his wife, an unhappy husband hires a private eye in the hopes of catching her with another man. But things dont quite go as expected.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: When a married politician falls in love with a woman at a party, things soon go wrong and his entire career and reputation are put in jeopardy.

programme.title: Painting Birds with Jim and Nancy Moir

programme.title: Reinventing the Orchestra with Charles Hazlewood
programme.desc: As Charles explores why the orchestra hasnt embraced electronic instruments, he discovers the reasons go far beyond technology.

programme.title: The Directors

programme.desc: An in-depth look into the career of the versatile Academy Award-winning actor Nicolas Cage.

programme.desc: A professors (Don Taylor) attempt to end an affair results in murder, leaving an infant as the lone witness.

programme.desc: A miserly janitor (Oscar Homolka) keeps the contents of a lost wallet, despite the protests of his wife (Jo Van Fleet).

programme.title: Red Right Hand
programme.desc: Cash is trying to live a quiet, honest life in a small Appalachian town. When a vicious crime boss forces him back into her services, he soon learns hes capable of anything to protect his family and his home.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.title: One Shot
programme.desc: To prevent a terrorist attack on U.S. soil, a Navy SEAL team leader and a CIA analyst must retrieve a detainee from a secret compound while fending off an assault by insurgents.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: One More Shot
programme.desc: A Navy SEAL squad leader escorts a suspected terrorist from a black site when they come under fire from a group of mercenaries.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity, and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater threat. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to recruit a team to stand against this newly-awakened enemy. Despite the formation of an unprecedented league of heroes in Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash, it may be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Brixton Lorr is a cybernetically enhanced soldier who possesses superhuman strength, a brilliant mind and a lethal pathogen that could wipe out half of the worlds population. Its now up to hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless operative Deckard Shaw to put aside their past differences and work together to prevent the seemingly indestructible Lorr from destroying humanity.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren and Mera steal the powerful Book of Legends. The Super Hero Girls head to Atlantis to recover the book before Siren can use it to create an army and take over the entire ocean.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight assembles his heroic friends like Green Arrow and Nightwing to stop the Joker and his cronies from unleashing a diabolical computer virus.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: When a powerful shape-shifting sorceress sets her eyes on Pos Staff of Wisdom, he suddenly realises hes going to need some help. Teaming up with a quick-witted corsac fox, he soon discovers that heroes can be found in the most unexpected places.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: With the evil wizard Gargamel hot on their trail, Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty embark on a journey through the Forbidden Forest to find a mysterious village.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Two overly-imaginative pranksters accidentally hypnotise their headmaster into thinking that hes a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.desc: Siren and Mera steal the powerful Book of Legends. The Super Hero Girls head to Atlantis to recover the book before Siren can use it to create an army and take over the entire ocean.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Disgraced FBI agents Marcus and Kevin go to bizarre lengths to catch a devious millionaire. They disguise themselves as dumb white socialites Brittany and Tiffany Wilson, the heiresses to a hotel fortune who are under threat. Gross-out comedic farce from the makers of `Scary Movie.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still Johns constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, Johns girlfriend. Though Loris displeasure is exacerbated by the pairs constant consumption of beer and weed, shes not the one whos most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of Johns boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted seeks legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary, civil-rights attorney when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: A selfish gambler works off his debt by coaching a baseball team comprised of underprivileged youths.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers, and falls in love with, a struggling but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: Whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embark on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

The unlikely pair embark on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Mollie is a pregnant woman whose partner has deserted her. When she goes into labour, friendly taxi driver James rushes her to hospital and the pair become firm friends. He slowly falls in love with her and her baby Mikey, but shes still looking for her perfect partner, not realising hes right under her nose. However we can hear Mikeys thoughts, and he wants James as his Dad.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Despite his efforts, Peter cant seem to shake his reputation for mischief among the other rabbits. Once he adventures out of the garden Peter finds himself in a world where mischief is appreciated, but soon his family come to bring him home.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In London during the swinging sixties, a promiscuous Cockney lad who lacks purpose or direction habitually seduces women and then moves on. When one of his girlfriends becomes pregnant, he refuses to marry her, preferring instead to carry on with more conquests, but eventually something happens which forces him to reconsider his shallow existence.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business, forcing his sons Michael and Sonny to lead the Corleones into a vendetta-filled war with other mob families.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his fathers former partner.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock is trying to take down Carlton Drake, the notorious and brilliant founder of the Life Foundation. While investigating one of Drakes experiments, Eddies body merges with the alien Venom -- leaving him with superhuman strength and power. Twisted, dark and fueled by rage, Venom tries to control the new and dangerous abilities that Eddie finds so intoxicating.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is still struggling to coexist with the shape-shifting extraterrestrial Venom. When deranged serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote, Brock and Venom must put aside their differences to stop his reign of terror.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: Stuck in a bizarre relationship with her dead, wisecracking Army pal, a veteran reunites with her solitary grandfather at his lake house.

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A serious TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mum. As he embraces positive holiday stories, romance blooms - but a career opportunity forces him to choose between ambition and love.

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: Stuck in a bizarre relationship with her dead, wisecracking Army pal, a veteran reunites with her solitary grandfather at his lake house.

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A young writer travels to the remote compound of a legendary pop star who mysteriously disappeared 30 years ago. Surrounded by a cult of sycophants and intoxicated journalists, she soon finds herself in the middle of his twisted plan.

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: A disposable employee is sent on a human expedition to colonize the ice world Niflheim. After one iteration dies, a new body is regenerated with most of his memories intact.

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: Exploring an abandoned visitor centre, Clover and her friends encounter a masked killer who murders them one by one. However, when they mysteriously wake up at the beginning of the same night, theyre forced to relive the terror over and over again.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower mans mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: Fighting for survival at an isolated fishing outpost, Eva and her crew are cursed after making the choice to not help a sinking ship off the coast. Facing the consequences, a darkness consumes them all, creating chaos and death at every turn.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: A mans quiet life gets upended when a UFO crashes in his backyard in rural Pennsylvania. As he befriends the mysterious extraterrestrial, things start to get complicated when two neighbours discover it and the government quickly closes in.

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Gloria and her grandfather Bud befriend a mysterious reindeer when the family gathers for Christmas. Bud comes to believe that Prancer may actually be magical, but Gloria fears his theory will send him straight to a retirement home.

programme.title: Nantucket Noel
programme.desc: Tensions rise when a woman falls for the son of a developer who wants to tear down the wharf that is home to her toy store.

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A new teacher juggles his pregnant wife and a class of children on a road trip.

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude Wheres My Donkey?
programme.desc: An Ofsted inspector arrives at St. Bernadettes and forgets who he is.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Gloria and her grandfather Bud befriend a mysterious reindeer when the family gathers for Christmas. Bud comes to believe that Prancer may actually be magical, but Gloria fears his theory will send him straight to a retirement home.

programme.title: Nantucket Noel
programme.desc: Tensions rise when a woman falls for the son of a developer who wants to tear down the wharf that is home to her toy store.

programme.title: Christmas With the Kranks
programme.desc: Luther Krank, fed up with the commerciality of Christmas, decides to skip the holiday and go on vacation with his wife, an easy decision to make with their daughter away anyway, but when she suddenly decides to come home, uproar ensues in the rush to celebrate Christmas at the last minute.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: A wicked demon seeks out naughty people, and terrorises a family in order to punish them at Christmas time.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: Hawthorne College is quieting down for the holidays. One by one, sorority girls on campus are being killed by a stalker. But the killer is about to discover that this generations women arent willing to become hapless victims as they fight back.

programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Bill moves his American wife Carol and children Nora and Lucas to Norway where hes inherited a family estate. There, Lucas discovers a mischievous barn elf from ancient folklore living in the barn who elf plots to get rid of the American intruders.

programme.desc: Hawthorne College is quieting down for the holidays. One by one, sorority girls on campus are being killed by a stalker. But the killer is about to discover that this generations women arent willing to become hapless victims as they fight back.

programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Bill moves his American wife Carol and children Nora and Lucas to Norway where hes inherited a family estate. There, Lucas discovers a mischievous barn elf from ancient folklore living in the barn who elf plots to get rid of the American intruders.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: The Prosecutor

programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. programme.desc: A look at how forensic science can help police solve serious crimes where the truth seems impossible to uncover. As the various twists and turns of each case unfold, the role of forensic science in providing answers is highlighted and examined.

programme.title: Britains Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: After a severely dysfunctional upbringing, Colin Ireland began frequenting a gay pub in Earls Court, London. There he met his victims, whom he would accompany home before binding them and strangling them to death. Ireland sought fame as a serial killer, and became known as the `Gay Slayer, brazenly alerting the media to his ruthless crimes despite meticulously cleaning the crime scenes to remove forensic evidence.

programme.title: Worlds Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: The disturbing and horrifying case of Horst Kroener, a 53 year old German man, who was jailed in 2016 for brutally murdering his Filipina wife when she asleep in their bed.

programme.sub-title: The Story of Ronald and His Boulders
programme.desc: Ronald the rhinos favourite pastime is bashing boulders - but one day he realises there are no more boulders left to bash on the savannah. Ronald sets out to find something else to bash - with almost catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the House of Leaves
programme.desc: Nelson the elephant wants to build the biggest and best house of leaves ever. His nephew Nigel is eager to help out, but Nelson is worried that the leaf house might be too fragile for his exuberant young nephew. When the house of leaves comes crashing down, Nelson wastes no time in telling Nigel off.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Gertie the Goat
programme.desc: Gertie the goat has agreed to take Bao Bao the panda on a climbing expedition up the So Hi Mountains. The other animals advise Gertie against the trip, since pandas are not renowned for their climbing skills. Will Gertie and Bao Bao prove the others wrong, or will they need some help from their friends?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Jungle Ball

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Great Rains

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.desc: Nelson is in an inventive mood, and agrees to make various objects for his friends. Alan is delighted when his very own scooter eventually arrives.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
